review_content: I love ASOS and allCustomer service they are just adorable
summarized_sentence: ASOS has amazing customer service and I love them for it.
reply_message: Hi there,Thank you so much for your kind words - we love ASOS too! Our customer service team are the best in the business and we're so glad you think so too.Thanks again,The ASOS Team

review_content: My order was left outside and the school kids ransacked it, however this was hermes who had left it outside and ASOS refunded me and resolved my issue immediately, Mairi was so kind and helpful. 10/10 customer service.
summarized_sentence: I had a great experience with ASOS's customer service when my order was left outside and ransacked by school kids.
reply_message: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! We're glad to hear that our customer service was able to help you out and that you were satisfied with the outcome.

summarized_sentence: The staff is friendly and helpful.
reply_message: Thank you so much for your kind words - our staff works hard to provide the best possible experience for our guests! We're so glad you enjoyed your time with us.

review_content: Replied quickly and made sure their customers were happy
summarized_sentence: The seller replied quickly and made sure their customers were happy.
reply_message: Thank you for your positive review! We're happy to know that you had a good experience working with us and that you're happy with the results. We'll continue to work hard to make sure our customers are satisfied.

review_content: Rebecca was patient and helpful with my queries, though there seems to be some logistic issues with ASOS delivery. I've only received 1 out of the 4 parcels that were deemed to be delivered on the same day.
summarized_sentence: ASOS delivery seems to have logistic issues, with only one out of four parcels delivered as promised on the same day.
reply_message: Hi, we're sorry to hear that there have been some logistic issues with your ASOS delivery. We will be sure to pass on your feedback to our team. Thank you for your patience and for taking the time to write a review.

review_content: Fast, kind, clear answer! Perfect that I love ASOS service
summarized_sentence: The reviewer loved the fast, kind, and clear service from ASOS.
reply_message: Thank you! We're happy to hear that you love our service!

review_content: It took over 20 minutes to be connected with the online chat service. Upon waiting for the chat to commence, it then took 18 minutes for the customer assistant to respond with an answer to my query, which was also very unhelpful. Overall the service was poor when comparing to other online chat services.
summarized_sentence: It took over 20 minutes to be connected with the online chat service and then 18 minutes for the customer assistant to respond, which was also very unhelpful, making the service overall poor when compared to other online chat services.
summarized_keywords: online chat, customer service, wait time
reply_message: We are sorry for the poor experience you had with our chat service. We strive to provide our customers with fast and efficient service and we apologize for falling short in this instance. We hope you will give us another chance in the future. Thank you for your feedback.

review_content: Terrible firm. I had such a bad time trying to get them to deliver that I won't use them again. Unfortunately I forgot to tell my wife, watching her go through the same pantomime . How does this firm stay on business ?
summarized_sentence: The reviewer had a bad experience with the firm and won't use them again.
reply_message: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're sorry to hear that you had such a negative experience and we'll be sure to pass your feedback along to the appropriate team. We hope you'll give us another chance in the future.

summarized_sentence: The review is positive and mentions that the content is helpful, clear, and prompt.
reply_message: Thank you so much for your helpful and clear review! We're so glad you appreciate our promptness in replying to you.

review_content: Ordered a Vivienne Westwood which was delivered on time but  arrived sealed but with no watch inside!  Christmas stress!  After initial frustration of trying to find a FAST way to get this resolved (ASOS no phone number and a chat box that kept disappearing unless you were like lightning on keyboard?), I liaised with Donique who resolved this quickly, re-ordering to be delivered within 4 working days.  This has minimized my delivery anxiety, as it is a present for my daughter.  Friendly and efficient service overall and providing it arrives (it was confirmed it was in stock) with watch inside(!), I will be a happy customer again. Sad state of affairs, that people (presumably at packing stage) steal, when the rest of us work hard to earn money to buy these treats. ASOS so far, so good!
summarized_sentence: I ordered a watch from ASOS, but it arrived without the watch inside.
reply_message: Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you had some trouble with your order and we appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us. We're glad to hear that our team was able to resolve the issue quickly and efficiently. We hope you have a great holiday season and we look forward to serving you again in the future.
